casebody.data:
HART
v.
DARWISH S243062 Supreme Court of California SEPTEMBER 13, 2017 Votes: Cantil-Sakauye, C.J., Chin, Corrigan, Liu, Cuéllar and Kruger, JJ.

The petition for review is granted. Further action in this matter is deferred pending the finality of this court's opinion in Parrish v. Latham & Watkins (Aug. 10, 2017, S228277) 3 Cal.5th 767, or pending further order of the court. (See Cal. Rules of Court, rule 8.512(d)(2).) Submission of additional briefing, pursuant to California Rules of Court, rule 8.520, is deferred pending further order of the court.
